attributes.action: Introduce a tax of 10p per plastic bag with proceeds earmarked for environmental spending.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Republic of Ireland brought in a plastic bag tax in 2002, requiring customers to pay 9 pence per plastic bag, leading to 90% less plastic bags being consumed. 

If plastic bags cost 10 pence each then consumers will take responsibility for their waste and reduce their consumption.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
